short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension plays a sound when the mouse wheel is used

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I thought it would be funny to play a "whee" sound whenever the mouse wheel is used.
Best used with mice which have a fast-scroll mode.

Source material:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tymI71r7Zp4 (For the sound)
http://www.free-icons-download.net/mouse-wheel-scroll-icon-64665/ (For the icon)
